TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Natawran, title = Natawran, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natawran} }

S.FORM: Natawran Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hualien ko Natawran a niyaro', 1,761 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,923 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 30% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,491 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 70% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,432 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 27%, Truku 1%, Bunun 0.5%, Paiwan 0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Natawran Itiniay i Ji'an Cen no Hoalien ko Natawran a niyaro', 1,761 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 4,923 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 30% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 1,491 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 70% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 3,432 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 27%, Troko 1%, Bonon 0.5%, Paiwan 0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
